long_description: The Deuter GoGo Pack looks athletic and fresh and carries a hefty load in comfort, whether for school, office or travel adventures. Padded, anatomically formed shoulder straps carry in comfort; waistbelt secures the load laterally and can be removed. Flexible aluminium stays within the foam profile can be bent to fit the back exactly. Special pocket holds valuables, such as a cell phone or music player; pack also has mesh side water-bottle pockets. Deuter GoGo Pack provides a special pocket that isolates damp items. Closeout.
short_description: The Deuter GoGo Pack looks athletic and fresh and carries a hefty load in comfort, whether for school, office or travel adventures.
